infoText: [c]Welcome Back to the lands of Middle-earth!
ยง5Update v0.9.5-beta is now live! Simply a sync to make sure all recently created content for the upcoming alpha release of the map is complete.

Added a new button to the main menu to help everyone out.  It will display the default key configuration I have set up for the pack.  Also tweaked the starter gear a bit in order to balance play like I want.
Keep watching as the Alpha release of the map looms, finally have a playtester to help iron out any bugs and to help make sure it is easily understood for you guys to get playing :D
